entries.title: Five new Steam games you probably missed (October 10, 2022)

entries.title: Rebuild society after a climate apocalypse in city builder Floodland

entries.title: Fallout, Homeworld, and more tabletop RPGs go digital native on Role

entries.title: Silent Hill director says multiple studios working on new games
entries.description: Christophe Gans, who directed the first Silent Hill movie, says Konami will "revive the franchise".
